comment: I really like this app. Great way to keep track of just about everything from cooking recipes to diy projects, hobbys, fashion, leisure activity's etc. Endless possibilities. I just feel the homepage can be a bit busy trying to show all your interests simultaneously. Would be nice to somehow tweak the UI to be less cluttered, at least on a mobile device.
scenarios: The homepage displays all interests simultaneously, making it feel cluttered on a mobile device. The user suggests tweaking the UI to make it less busy.
key sentence: The homepage displays all interests simultaneously, making it feel cluttered on a mobile device. The user suggests tweaking the UI to make it less busy.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
